summary: The Everly Brothers, Don and Phil, were an American music duo known for their guitar skills and beautiful singing harmonies. Growing up in a musical family, they started performing on radio as kids. In the 1950s, they had big hits like "Bye Bye Love" and "All I Have to Do Is Dream." Their style mixed rock, country, and pop. They joined the Marines in 1961, and their popularity declined, but they remained influential. Many famous bands, like the Beatles, were inspired by them. The Everly Brothers were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and are considered one of the greatest duos of all time.
title: The Everly Brothers
